title: Notion Life OS
subtitle: I help you run your entire life from one Notion system—tasks, goals, habits, and knowledge—so nothing feels scattered anymore.

title: Simplified Life OS
subtitle: I give you a clean, beginner-friendly Life OS so you can get organized without complex databases or overwhelm.

title: Second Brain & Knowledge Management System
subtitle: I teach you how to capture, organize, and retrieve ideas so your best thoughts are never lost.

title: Client & Content OS
subtitle: I help you manage clients, content pipelines, and collaborations in one place—perfect for creators and freelancers.

title: Goal Setting & Planning System
subtitle: I show you how to turn vague goals into clear plans with actionable steps and long-term tracking.

title: Habit Tracking & Habit Building System
subtitle: I help you build and maintain habits using simple trackers, reflection, and consistency-first workflows.

title: Task & Project Management System
subtitle: I help you stay on top of daily tasks and long-term projects with clear priorities and flexible dashboards.

title: Notion AI & AgentOS Framework
subtitle: I show you how to use Notion AI to create personal agents that help you think, plan, and execute better.

title: Notion From Scratch (Foundations KB)
subtitle: I teach you Notion from the ground up—databases, relations, formulas, and dashboards—step by step.

title: Productivity Principles & Workflows
subtitle: I help you understand how productivity really works and apply proven workflows inside Notion.

title: Information Organization & Idea Capture System
subtitle: I help you capture ideas effortlessly and organize them so they’re always easy to find and use later.

title: Design-First Notion Workspace System
subtitle: I help you design clean, aesthetic, and intuitive Notion dashboards that you’ll actually enjoy using.
